section.p: When I saw the combination, I got some idea of the Pascal Triangle, which I can get c(n,m) in O(n m). Then we can preprocess the whole Pascal Triangle, and when I need them, I can get it in O(1). So the whole time complexity would be O(t n m). But it still seems too slow. Then I found that I can make a prefix sum to keep the numbers of fit combinations that I can search a line in O(1). So the total time complexity would be O(n (m+t)) this time.
